segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making such a mess on the floor and the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is getting bigger and bigger, and she's just ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so unsanitary, with the water all over the place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans it up soon before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are making it worse by climbing on that stool, adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand this mess; it's making me feel sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would take charge and fix this situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just gross, and I can't look anymore.
segments.speaker: PAR
